College_Summary: SRM Kattankulathur Dental College, Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu was established in 2007. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses that are recognized by the Dental Council of India. Offering the Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) at the UG level and Master of Dental Surgery (MDS) in six different specialties at the PG level. Admission to its courses are based on the candidate’s performance in the NEET examination. To be eligible for admissions into the BDS course candidates need to pass their 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry and Biology as compulsory subjects , and for its MDS course candidates need to pass BDS or any equivalent degree from a recognized institute.

The college is approved by the Distance Education Bureau (DEB), Medical Council of India(MCI).  CMC Vellore Distance Education provides courses like Post Graduate Diploma in Family Medicine (PGDFM), International Post Graduate Diploma in Family Medicine (I-PGDFM), Distance Fellowship in Diabetes Management (DFID), Post Graduate Diploma, Certificate in General Dentistry (CGD), Foundation for Dental Practice (FFDP).

Knowledge Business School Salem (KBSS) was established in 2011 by the Knowledge Institution of technology Trust (KIOTT). This institution is a part of (KIOT) which is one of the prominent B- schools in the state of Tamilnadu.

College_Name: Padmavathi College of Pharmacy and Research Institute, Dharmapuri
Swamy Vivekanandha College of Pharmacy - [SVCP], Namakkal
College_Summary: PPG Business School is an AICTE-approved autonomous B-School and was established in 2010 under the umbrella of P. Perichi Gounder Memorial Charitable Trust. Institute is affiliated to Anna University. PPG College offers an MBA program in different specializations at the PG level. Admission in this course is granted based on a valid score in graduation and the TANCET entrance exam which is conducted by Anna University itself. Along with this, the college also offers value-added PG Diploma and Diploma courses. More than 50 companies visit the college campus every year and recruit approximately 500+ students on average.

College_Name: Government Arts College For Men Nandanam
College_Summary: South Indian Vaniar Educational Trust college is a general degree college that offers Arts, Science, and Commerce courses. It is situated in the Velachery Main Road Tambaram near Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The college was founded in the year of 1966 due to the initiative taken by Honourable Justice Mr. S.A. Ayyasami Chettiar through establishing a charitable trust in the year 1960. Then Tamil Nadu government allocated a site for the trust of area 27.47 acres at a minimal cost and the college was established at Gowrivakkam in July 1966. The college is affiliated to the University of Madras. In 1992-93, the SIVET college started its own self-financing streams as II shift, in a separate wing with B.Sc. computer science being the first course in it. The college had secured B++ grade in the NAAC accreditation.

College_Name: Prist University, Directorate of Distance Education, Thanjavur
Vel Tech Ranga Sanku Arts College, Chennai
College_Summary: Sarah Tucker College is an autonomous college for women established in the year 1895. It is situated in the Tirunelveli district of Tamil Nadu and affiliated to Manonmaniam Sundaranar University. According to NIRF ranking 2020, the college is ranked at #101out of 200 colleges under the overall category. It offers B.Sc., BA, B.Com and BCA courses at the UG level and MA, M.Com, M.Sc. and MCA courses at the PG level. Admissions are granted on the basis of merit. Reputed companies visit the college for providing placement opportunities to students

College_Name: Amrita School of Arts and Sciences - [ASAS], Coimbatore
College_Summary: Government Medical College (GMC) Omandurar was founded in 2015 and is commonly known as GMC Omandurar. It is the first institute in Chennai district which offers MBBS and PG Diploma courses for the students. Admissions are secured with respect to marks scored by candidates in NEET exam.

College_Name: School of Law, SRM IST, Kanchipuram
College_Summary: Government Vellore Medical College was established in 2005 and is affiliated to The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate degrees in the medical fields namely, MBBS, MD, and MS. Admission to the courses provided by the college is based on the scores obtained by candidates in the National Eligibility-cum-Entrance Test (NEET). The NEET-UG exam is the selection criteria for UG courses whereas the NEET-PG is required for admission to postgraduate medical courses in the college. Both online and offline application methods are available for this college.

Thiruvarur Medical College offers admissions to the PG Diploma courses based on merit in the last qualifying examination. The college has different facilities for its students such as Library, Hostel, Hospital, Sports facilities etc. Admissions to Thiruvarur Medical College are done once the candidates go through the counselling process.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Hospitality and Hotel Administration)

College_Summary: Patrician College of Arts and Science, Chennai, Tamil Nadu is a private co-educational institute, established in 2001. It is affiliated to the University of Madras and has been accredited ‘A’ grade by NAAC. The institute offers UG, PG and M.Phil programmes across Arts, Science and Commerce streams. Admissions to the college is based either on merit or entrance exams conducted by the college itself. Interested students can apply in online or offline mode.

College_Summary: Kings Cornerstone International College, established in 2010 as a training institute, partnered with Pearson Education, UK. The college which offers B.A., B.E, B.Sc, B.Des at the undergraduate level and MBA, M.Sc and M.A at the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done either based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination or based on their performance in entrance exams. Some of the top recruiters that recruit King's students include Cisco, IBM, Microsoft, Siemens etc. All study abroad programmes delivered at King’s Cornerstone are a part-India and part-abroad study in the most student-friendly destinations across the globe. With University partners in Australia, Germany and the UK

College_Name: PPG Business School, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu
College_Summary: Thiruthangal Nadar College is an Arts and Science College that was established in 1997. It is a private and self-financing college. This college is affiliated to the University of Madras and is accredited by NAAC. Thiruthangal Nadar College Chennai offers a variety of UG, PG diploma and certification courses. The college functions as a dual shift institution which provides the majority of its courses in the morning shift between 8.15 am to 12.45 pm and a limited number of courses in the afternoon shift between 1.00 pm to 5.30 pm.

College_Summary: Firebird Institute of Research in Management (FIRM) is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. Established in the year 2017, the two-year full-time PGDM programme at Firebird Institute of Research in Management is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is fully linked with the industry. At FIRM, every student in the programme works under the mentorship of a corporate executive to learn the practical side of management from experienced professionals throughout their two years of study.

Established in 2017, XIME Chennai is part of the 3 XIME campuses in India. XIME Chennai campus offers an AICTE approved 2-year Post-Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM). XIME Chennai’s PGDM programme is similar to the MBA programme offered by other institutes. XIME Chennai accepts the score of CAT / XAT/ MAT/ CMAT/ ATMA / GMAT/ TANCET exams for admission to its 2-year full-time PGDM Program followed by GD and PI. College_Summary: Avidus Academy of Management is a private college, established in 2011 and accredited by the NAAC. It is considered the top Business School in Chennai and provides students with UGC approved PG and PG Diploma programs. The flagship course of the institution is the 2 year full-time MBA. The b-school also offers the Post Graduate Diploma in Management course. Admission to Avidus Academy courses depends on the scores obtained in CAT / MAT / TANCET. The institute is currently accepting admission for its MBA program. Interested candidates can apply through the online mode. Check: AAM Chennai Admission

College_Name: State Institute of Hotel Management and Catering Technology - [SIHMCT], Tiruchirappalli
College_Summary: Angappa College of Arts and Science, Tamil Nadu was set-up in 1987 which is an establishment by Angappa Educational Trust. It is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu India. The Institute is affiliated to Bharathiar University, Tamil Nadu, Coimbatore and is also recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC).

College_Name: Patrician College of Arts and science, Chennai
College_Summary: Kumaraguru College of Liberal Arts and Science (KCLAS), Coimbatore comes under the aegis of Kumaraguru Institutions, Coimbatore which was started by the charitable trust of Sakthi Group. The college is ranked 13 among ‘Top 100 Indian Universities’ as per the NIRF College Ranking Charts. KCLAS offers 10 undergraduate programs in Commerce, Management, Visual Communication, Psychology, Political Science, Data Science, Tamil (Creative Writing) and Economics. It also offers Master's program in Social Work and Political Science. Admission to KCLAS Coimbatore is done on the basis of merit.

College_Name: Nehru College of Aeronautics and Applied Sciences - [NCASS], Coimbatore
College_Summary: Anna University (AU) Coimbatore, is a public university, located on the outskirts of Coimbatore city, established on 4th September 1978, recognized by UGC as “University with Potential for Excellence (UPE)”. The University provides many UG, PG and Research Programs for PhD students’ courses in various disciplines of Engineering & Technology relevant to the current and projected needs of the society.

Rajah Muthiah Dental College & Hospital, Annamalai is a government institute that was established in 1980. The college is affiliated with Annamalai University, Chidambaram, and is approved by DCI. It offers BDS at the UG level and MDS at the PG level. It also offers PhD at the Research level. Admission to the college is based on the entrance exam.

College_Name: Bharthidasan School of Management, BMS Tiruchirappali
Vinayaka Missions Kirupananda Variyar Medical College - [VMKVMC], Salem
Firebird Institute of Research in Management
College_Summary: United College of Pharmacy at Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu, established in 2019, is being considered as a rising star in the disguise of a private educational institute for providing higher education opportunities in the field of pharmacy. It offers 4 years of undergraduate pharmacy program and 2 years of diploma in pharmacy. The admission to these courses is merit-based. Application mode is online.

PSG Institute of Advanced Studies (PSGIAS), Coimbatore is an institution established under PSG Group, an approved research centre by Anna University and Bharathiar University for doing research in Mechanical Engineering, Nanoscience and Technology, Material Science, Biotechnology, Nano Biotechnology, Physics and Chemistry. The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs in the discipline of Science, Engineering and Management. Admission to PSGIAS Coimbatore is merit and entrance based.

College_Name: K.S.R. College of Arts and Science for Women - [KSRCASW], Tiruchengodu
College_Summary: The Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development (RGNIYD), Sriperumbudur, Tamil Nadu is an institution of National Importance under the Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports, Government of India. The college offers UG course, Pg course, Diplomas, Ph.D. with multiple specializations under every course. Admission to these courses is merit and entrance based. Applicants seeking admission to the institute may apply online as well as offline. The institute and all of its members have been working tirelessly on youth-related issues and making every workplace a better environment for our youth.

College_Name: The National Institute of Hotel Management - [NIHM], Chennai
College_Summary: Kumararani Meena Muthiah College of Arts & Science located in Chennai was established in the year 1996 and is a self-financed college. It is affiliated to the University of Madras, Chennai. The institute offers undergraduate and post-graduate courses across various disciplines. KRMMC Chennai aims to deliver quality education under well-experienced and dedicated faculties and provides excellent infrastructural facilities to its students

College_Name: Glanis Institute of Allied Health Sciences, Madurai

College_Summary: Remo International College of Aviation (RICA) is a private aviation college established in 2012. At RICA, a total of 21 courses in 6 streams and 5 specializations are offered. Streams aviation, business, management studies, humanities & social sciences, hospitality & travel, mass communication & media, banking, finance & insurance offered in RICA for admission. At the UG level, the Institute offers BBA, B.Sc, and B.Com in various aviation fields, while MBA is the only program at the PG level. In addition to these courses, the Institute also offers diplomas in airline management, pilot training, flight dispatcher, RTR, and cabin crew. Admission criteria vary according to the choice of the course. Forms of the registration for the entrance exam is available online on their official site.

Kumaraguru College of Liberal Arts and Science
College_Summary: DOT School of Design, established in 2020, is a multi-disciplinary design college affiliated with Alagappa University, Karaikudi. The institute offers UG and PG courses in the field of Design. The most popular courses of the institute include a 4-year full-time B.Des course in 5 specializations and a 2-year full-time M.Des course in 3 specializations. To be eligible for admission to the DOT School of Design, candidates must appear for an interview and obtain a valid score on DOT Design Aptitude Test (DOT-DAT). The Institute also provides scholarships up to INR 1 Lakh.

Quaide Milleth International Academy of Media Studies (QIAMS) was established in the year 2017. The institute is a part of Quaide Milleth Educational and Social Trust (QUEST) and affiliated to University of Madras. QIAMS offers Certificate, Diploma and Advanced Diploma courses in the discipline of Content Writing, Web Designing, Audio Engineering, Videography, VFX and DI, Visual Communication, Journalism, Photography, News Reading, RJ, VJ, Adobe Premiere and Avid Media Composer

College_Name: Rajah Muthiah Dental College & Hospital, Annamalai

College_Summary: Light and Life Academy was established in 2001 is the first custom-designed institute for professional photographers in India. The institute believes in the method of modern Gurukul and has international collaborations with Kodak India, Eastman Kodak USA, LMW- Coimbatore, Calumet-USA, Photoquip-India, ZenTask-India, Gretag Imaging-Switzerland. Light and Life Academy offers PG Diploma in Professional Photography and Digital Production & PG Diploma in Documentary and Corporate Filmmaking. Admission to Light and Life Academy Courses is done on the basis of a first-come-first-serve basis. Admission is granted to eligible candidates through the selection process followed by an interview.

College_Name: St. Charles College of Education - [SCCE], Madurai
College_Summary: Footwear Design and Development Institute (FDDI), Chennai is one of the best institutes in Chennai. The institute has a 100% placement record. Many reputed National and Multinational companies like Nike, Adidas, Puma, Reliance Retail, Landmark Group, and others visit the institute for on-campus interviews every year. FDDI Chennai offers degree programs in the discipline of Footwear, Fashion and Retail, etc. FDDI Chennai has 3 departments which are as follows:

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Design [M.Des] (Footwear Design and Production)

College_Name: United College of Medical Sciences, Coimbatore
PSG Institute of Advanced Studies - [PSGIAS], Coimbatore

College_Summary: St. Joseph’s College is a co-educational private institution established in 1994. The college is run by the Management of Society for Education for Life and managed by Rev. Father Dr. J.E. Arul Raj from 2004. It is accredited by NAAC and affiliated to the University of Madras, Chennai.

Sri Durgadevi Polytechnic College (SPDC), Thiruvallur is a well-known college in the field of technical diplomas in Tamilnadu. It was established by the chairmanship of Thiru R.S Munirathinam and it is governed by Lakshmikantammal Trust.

College_Name: Periyar University College of Arts and Science - [PRUCAS], Idappadi
College_Summary: PSG Polytechnic College, Coimbatore, established in 1939 under the PSG & Sons Charity Trust,  is one of the most prestigious polytechnic colleges around Coimbatore. PSG PCT offers Diploma in 16 streams in both regular and Sandwich mode, and 1 Post Diploma course in Computer Applications. Some of the most popular Diploma courses offered by this college are Mechatronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering (Sandwich), IT, etc. Admission to all the courses is merit-based.

Annamalai Polytechnic College (APC) Chettinad at Sivaganga was established in 1956 by Dr. Rajah Sir Muthiah Chettier. The institution is governed by the Rajah Muthiah Chettiar Charitable and Educational Trust. The College is a govt-aided institution providing technical education and training to men and women at post-secondary school level with its diploma courses. From 1979 onwards, the institution through its Community Polytechnic Scheme serves the nearby rural community by its courses. This scheme operates under the guidance of MHRD of Indian Government. The placements opportunities are decent here and many women empowerment events are conducted periodically.

College_Name: J.N.N Arts And Science Women's College, Thiruvallur
Quaide Milleth International Academy of Media Studies - [QIAMS], Chennai
College_Summary: KPR College of Arts Science and Research (KPRCAS) was established in the year 2019 by the KPR Group in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It offers 11 undergraduate programs in the fields of Management, Commerce and Computer Science through its 4 different schools. It has signed MoUs with various organizations. KPRCAS has a Career Development Centre (CDC) that provides placement assistance to students. More than 380 offers were made during KPRCAS Placement Drive 2023. The campus is spread over an area of 11.44 acres. The institute offers all the necessary facilities like, sports facilities, library, canteen, seminar hall, auditorium, etc.

College_Name: Orient Flights Civil Aviation Academy- [OFCAA], Chennai
College_Summary: Clusters Media College, Coimbatore,  was established in the year 2007 and is a private college. The placement cell of the college provides training to the students in partnership with Qube, Sony, and Nikocollege is approved by Alagappa University and Bharathiar University. At the UG level, it offers B.Sc and at the PG level, it offers an M.Sc in various disciplines. Apart from this the college also provides Diploma and Certificate courses. Admission to all the courses is on the basis of the previous year’s qualifying examination

College_Summary: Sri Ramakrishna College of Arts & Science For Women (SRCW), Coimbatore, established in 1991, is a Private Autonomous college affiliated to Bharathiar University and is re-accredited with an A+ grade by NAAC. With an academic excellence of over 33 years, the college continues to fulfill the holistic educational needs required for the empowerment of women. The college offers 14 undergraduate programs, 5 post graduate programs and various research programs in the discipline of Computer Science, Life Sciences, Management, Commerce and Arts. The college is listed among the Best Colleges at the National Level by various ranking agencies such as The Week, India Today, Times B School etc. The college has an excellent academic record of 392 University ranks including 53 Gold medals.

College_Summary: The Government Polytechnic College in Madurai was set up in 1946. The institution is the first among all government polytechnics to earn autonomy. Students can opt to pursue a range of accredited Diploma Engineering programs at the college, in both full-time and part-time modes, right after class 10th. The Diplomas are offered in the engineering disciplines of Civil, Mechanical, Electrical & Electronics, Computer, Polymer Technology, and Plastic Technology.

College_Name: Davinci School of Design and Architecture, Chennai
College_Summary: Sri Annai Kamakshi Music and Fine Arts College is an initiative of Sri Annai Kamakshi Kalaikudam, a prestigious name in art education. It is a unique, multi-dimensional, multi-faculty, premier, co-educational College of South India. It consummates the great vision of its founder, Chennai-based artist S. Venkatachapathy, M.F.A, (Achalam) whose work since 1993 has been exhibited worldwide and received encomiums everywhere. The college offers wide range of courses and programmes from under graduate courses – B.F.A and B.A to pre-degree Diploma and Certificate courses as per Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University’s prescribed syllabus in Painting, Visual Communication, Bharathanatyam, Carnatic vocal and more.

Panimalar Polytechnic College is Chennai’s leading private institution, established in 1994. The college offers a Diploma in Engineering in four separate streams. The eligibility criteria for admissions in both 1st year and direct 2nd are passing marks in S.S.L.C (math and science compulsory) or H.Sc (math, physics, and chemistry compulsory). Aspirants can apply offline. Some of the top recruiters of the college are RCS, HCL, Wipro, Hyundai, IBM, MRF, Godrej, Nissan, etc.

Mass Polytechnic College was established in the year 2007. The College offers Diploma programme in numerous specializations and the admission is on the basis of Merit. Candidates can apply to this College online.

College_Name: St.Mary's College of Health Science, Tenkasi
College_Summary: AMK Technological Polytechnic College is a Government-aided College and is approved by AICTE. The College offers Diploma courses in various specializations. Admission in the courses is purely based on the merit obtained in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: Aalim Muhammed Salegh Polytechnic College, Chennai
College_Summary: NPR Polytechnic College is a Private Institute which was established in 2007. The college is located in Dindigul District, Tamil Nadu and is one of the prestigious wings of NPR Group of Institutions Society. NPR Polytechnic College provides Engineering Diploma courses for the duration of three years. The courses are approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated to State Board of Technical Education and Training, Tamil Nadu (SBTET)

College_Name: Rajah Muthiah Medical College & Hospital - [RRMCH], Annamalai
College_Summary: Paramveer Polytechnic College (PPC) is a private institution located in Dharmapuri, Tamil Nadu. It was founded by Soundaram Chokkanathan Educational and Charitable Trust. Paramveer Polytechnic College is an AICTE approved and self-financing Institution, which is affiliated to DOTE, Chennai.

College_Name: Sri Meenakshi Government Arts College for Women, Madurai
College_Summary: SCAD Polytechnic College is a private institution located in Cheranmahadevi, Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu. The College was established in 1997 by SCAD Group, with the aim of imparting quality technical education within the reach of students from the rural areas of Tirunelveli, Tuticorin, and Kanyakumari. This college is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, accredited by NBA and is Affiliated to DOTE, Chennai. The college strives to impart quality engineering education as well as practical skills and make them ready for the corporate and industrial world.

College_Name: Kavitha's College of Arts and Science, Namakkal
Sri Ramakrishna College of Arts & Science For Women - [SRCW], Coimbatore
Sacred Heart College of Arts and Science, Dindigul
College_Summary: PSR Polytechnic College (PSRPC), Sivakasi is one of the best educational institutions of the state for polytechnic education. The institute was established by the Sons of P.S. Ramaswamy Naidu in 2007. The institute aims at promoting engineering education to the backward areas of Virudhunagar district. It is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to the Directorate of Technical Education, Tamil Nadu. The institute offers diploma courses in five different disciplines to aspirants. The institute aims at offering diploma courses according to the industrial needs. The admission is merit-based and is taken care of by the DTE, Tamil Nadu.

Arulmigu Senthilandavar Polytechnic College was established in 1985 in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu and provides Diploma courses in engineering. The college is accredited by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with the Directorate of Technical Education Chennai. The institute is privately owned and has a student strength of around 1500. The institute is spread across a beautiful campus of 20 acres and imparts technical knowledge and practical skills to its students.

College_Name: Sri Annai Kamakshi Music and Fine Arts College, Chennai
College_Summary: Christian Polytechnic College or CPC was established in 1984 at Oddanchatram. For the upcoming academic year of 2020-21, the college is approved by AICTE and affiliated to DOTE, Chennai for the conduct of courses.

T.S. Srinivasan Polytechnic College situated at Chennai was established in 1997. It is an AICTE, New Delhi approved college for Polytechnic and is found affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education, Chennai, Thiruvallur.

Sri Durgadevi Polytechnic College (SPDC), Thiruvallur is a well-known college in the field of technical diplomas in Tamilnadu. It was established by the chairmanship of Thiru R.S Munirathinam and it is governed by Lakshmikantammal Trust.

Imayam Polytechnic College kannanur is among the best Polytechnic Colleges in Tiruchirappalli, Tamilnadu. It was established under the chairmanship of Mr. Rtn. A. Andi. It is recognised by All India Council for Technical Education and governed by Imayam Education Trust. This College has the availability of Engineering diploma programmes across 6 Different branches.

Don Bosco Polytechnic College, Chennai is established by Don Bosco Educational institutions in 2013. It offers various diploma courses in the field of Engineering for a duration of 3 years. Admission to these courses is purely merit-based through candidates’ scores in their qualifying examination. The institution also offers Diploma (Lateral Entry) courses to those students who have successfully passed 10+2 examination.

Konghu Vellalar Polytechnic College is situated in Tamil Nadu, established in 2007. The college offers a Diploma degree across major disciplines of Engineering. The admission procedure is completely merit-based. It also offers lateral entry to the 2nd year of the Diploma courses. Candidates have to pass the 10th and 12th examination for admission to Diploma (Regular) and Diploma (Lateral) courses respectively.

Sakthi Polytechnic College is a government aided technical institution that came into existence on 1981. It is located in the district of Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu. The college provides high quality technical education for the students by offering two categories of diploma courses in the Engineering discipline. During its inception, it was started with three courses and later on grown much to offer 6 diploma courses. Subsequently, 4 of the diploma courses are being offered under the self-financed category from around the year 2002.

The Kavery Polytechnic College (TKPTC), Salem in Tamil Nadu, is a private college that has created a name for itself over the few years in the State of Tamil Nadu. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering branches. Admission to this reputed college is strictly merit based. Big Companies like Aditya Trading Solutions, Allsec Technologies, HDFC Bank, Infosys, and IDBI Bank, etc. visit the campus every year for recruiting the students.

Vethamonickam Memorial CSI Polytechnic is operated by Kanyakumari Diocese of the Church of South India Association. The association is one of the 22 Dioceses of the Church of South India Trust Association functioning within the revenue district of Kanyakumari.

Annai J.K.K. Sampooraniammal Polytechnic College is a private college founded in1984 under the Annai J.K.K Sampoorani Ammal Charitable Trust. It aims at imparting technical education to the students of both urban and rural areas. The institute is affiliated to the Tamil Nadu State Board of Technical Education and approved by AICTE. It offers a Diploma in engineering across ten disciplines. The institute’s campus spreads over an area of 21.34 acres having all modern infrastructural facilities.

Central Polytechnic College, Vattiyoorkavu was established in 1958 and has been providing the best education in Kerala. The college is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education (SBTE). The College offers 3year diploma courses in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical & Electronics, Electronics, Textile Technology, and Computer Engineering. Many multinational companies and Indian companies including WIPRO, EVASOFT, HCL, Larson, MRF, QUEST GLOBAL, etc., have visited the College for recruiting the students.

CIT Sandwich Polytechnic College (CITSPC) is a private college located in Coimbatore that got established in the year 1961. It is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). The college offers full-time/ part time 3-year duration diploma courses to its students. The 7 specializations that it provides for the diploma course are: Mechanical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering (Sandwich Course), Instrumental and Control Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Automobile Engineering, Chemical Engineering. The admission process is done in online mode and selection is merit-based.

College_Name: Vethamonickam Memorial CSI Polytechnic College, Kanyakumari
Annai J.K.K. Sampooraniammal Polytechnic College, Erode

College_Summary: Arulmigu Palaniandavar Polytechnic College (APCC), a Government-aided institution established in 2003. The college provides 5 aided and 3 self-supporting diploma courses in engineering. A lateral entry is also possible in the second year of the curriculum for the provided courses. The admissions are based on merit. Applications are available online.

EIT Polytechnic College (EITPC), Erode, previously known as Erode Institute of Technology is a Government Aided Institute. It is one of the premier technical institutes of the southern region of Tamilnadu was established in the year 1980 run by The Mudaliar Educational Trust, Erode. The college offers Diploma courses in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Mechanical engineering, Textile Engineering. Admission is done on the basis of candidates’ merit scores.

College_Name: Sri Ramakrishna Mission Vidyalaya Polytechnic College, Coimbatore

College_Summary: Arasan Ganesan Polytechnic College was founded by Arasan A.M. S Ganesan in 1981. It is a Government-aided College which was made by the order of Tamil Nadu government. Arasan Ganesan polytechnic college is affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Tamil Nadu and is approved by AICTE. It is situated near Sivakasi-Virudhunagar main road approximately 9 km away from Sivakasi town. Arasan Ganesan Polytechnic College offers a course of 3-years duration diploma courses in different streams of Engineering domain.

Alagappa Government Polytechnic College was started in the year 1955 at Karaikudi by Dr. RM. Alagappa Chettiar, a renowned industrialist and philanthropist, with an aim to provide quality education to students and keep them at par with the growing field of technology. Later in the year 1966, the Government of Tamilnadu undertook the college.

College_Name: PT Lee Chengalvaraya Naicker Polytechnic College, Chennai
College_Summary: Arulmigu Thirupurasundari Amman Polytechnic College (ATAPC) was established on August 15, 1984. This institution was situated in Kanchipuram, a district in Tamil Nadu, this private, self-financed college was founded and initiated with the cause of taking steps to impart knowledge to the rural students. ATAPC has been claimed as one of the best polytechnic colleges in the state.

Elumalai Polytechnic College is situated at Villupuram in Tamil Nadu state of India. The college was established in the year 1983 and owes its existence to the beneficiation and philanthropy of Thiru. E. Swamikannu, a business magnet of Villupuram. Elumalai Polytechnic College is approved by AICTE. The college offers Diploma courses under seven specialisations. The college provides all the facilities for students. It has hostels available for both the boys and girls. The college also has a very active placement cell which holds a great placement record.

College_Name: Padmabhushan Sri N.Ramaswami Ayyar Memorial Polytechnic College, Tiruchirappalli
College_Summary: Sankara Polytechnic College, established in 1983 is a private polytechnic institute which offers polytechnic courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. The highest Placement Package offered to SPC's students is around INR 1.8 LPA.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

College_Name: Thanthai Periyar E. V. Ramasamy Government Polytechnic College - [TPEVR GPTC], Vellore
Virudhunagar S .Vellaichamy Nadar Polytechnic College, Virudhunagar
College_Summary: CSI Polytechnic College is a premier polytechnic institute located at Salem in Tamil Nadu that got established in 1984. It is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education, Chennai. The college offers full time Diploma courses across 10 different specializations, broadly categorized as engineering, information technology and instrumentation and control. All these courses are approved by AICTE. The duration of the diploma course is 3 years. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of marks obtained in the 10th standard.

College_Name: Arulmigu Thirupurasundari Amman Polytechnic College - [ATAPC ], Kanchipuram
Sri Nallalaghu Nadar Polytechnic College, Chennai
College_Summary: Located in Kanchipuram and established in the year 1984, Adhiparasakthi Polytechnic College is one of the outstanding institutions in the state, Tamil Nadu. This affiliation of the college is certified by the Anna University, Tamil Nadu and is approved by All India Council of Technical education. Being a private institution, this is also approved by the Tamil Nadu government and has NBA certifications.

Chamber of Commerce Manali Ramakrishna Polytechnic College also known as C.C.M. Ramakrishna Polytechnic College got established on 1984 at Kuruvady in Thanjavur of the state Tamil Nadu. C.C.M. Ramakrishna Polytechnic College offers 3-year full-time Diploma Courses in the Engineering and Technology Education to the interested candidates who have passed 10th or 12th. Candidate has to fill the prescribed application form and submit it to the Principal of the institution. The College also has an active placement cell which invites renowned companies to conduct interviews and recruit candidates every year.

Gomathi Ambal Polytechnic College (GAPC) was established in the year 1984 and it is located in the Tirunelveli District of Tamil Nadu. The college is ISO certified, which offers 6 diploma courses approved by AICTE in the domain of Engineering and Technology. Any candidate looking forward to taking admission in any of these courses must have passed their SSC from a recognized board with minimum qualifying marks and do not require any entrance ranking.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Tool and Die Engineering

College_Name: Thiru Ramakrishna Nallamai  Polytechnic College, Dharapram
Thanthai Roever Institute Of Polytechnic College, Perambalur

College_Summary: Pollachi College of Arts and Science (PCAS), Coimbatore Pollachi College of Arts and Science (PCAS) was established in the year 2014 by Hayagreeva Educational and Charitable Trust. The institute has a record providing 90% placement to its students. It offers 8 undergraduate courses in Science, Commerce and Computer Science. PCAS has a sister institute in Coimbatore namely Pollachi Institute of Engineering and Technology (PIE Tech).

Dusi Polytechnic College is a private institution situated at Dusi, Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu. It college offers various diploma courses in the Engineering field. The selection procedure is completely merit-based on the basis of a state-level entrance examination. However, the selection for Admission 2022 will be done on the basis of marks obtained by the students in their qualifying examinations. No entrance exam will be conducted.

College_Name: Christ The King Polytechnic College, Coimbatore

College_Summary: Arulmurugan Polytechnic College is a private college that comes under Arulmurugan Institutes and is affiliated with the Directorate of Technical Education, Chennai. The co-educational institute is located in Thennilai, Karur, Tamil Nadu. It is a self-financing Institute established in the year of 2007 and is run by Ms/ Saraswati education Trust. It has received approval from the All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi.

College_Name: Pollachi College of Arts and Science - [PCAS], Coimbatore
College_Summary: Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Polytechnic College (DSPC), situated in Perambalur, fields after 10th examinations Tamil Nadu and established in 1998. It is approved by AICTE, New Delhi. Admissions are offered based on 10th-grade marks.

CPCL Polytechnic College is a premier college located in Chennai that provides technical education. The college was established by the CPCL Educational Trust in 1988. All the courses are affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education (DOTE), Chennai and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
